hero.title: Middle and High Unit for Multiple Intelligences and Talents (Boys)
hero.subtitle: Al-Tamakon Comprehensive School / Middle and High Unit for Multiple Intelligences and Talents (Boys)

content.heading: Multiple Intelligences – Intermediate and Secondary Stages
content.paragraph:
Males
The student studies in this unit within the regular education track (ordinary certificate), following the age-based (ministerial) standards of the Qatari national curriculum, with the provision of arrangements and accommodations tailored to the student’s abilities and needs.
